item.title: Khaṭar al-Yahūd ʻalá Filasṭīn al-muqaddasah wa-al-aqṭār al-ʻArabīyah : nidāʼ wa-bayān min Filasṭīn al-ʻArabīyah al-Islāmīyah al-mujāhidah ilá kull Muslim wa-ilá kull ʻArabī fī mashāriq al-arḍ wa-maghāribihā.
